items.sentence: Tom is a guy that I lived with for three months.
Tom has been waiting all morning to talk to you.
Tom has been stealing money out of the register.
Tom has been spending a lot of time working out.
Tom has been hired by Mary to look after things.
Tom has a lot of ties, so I borrowed one of his.
I wish that Tom wouldn't always talk about work.
I'd love to be able to spend more time with you.
It's hard to stay calm in a situation like that.
Would you let me borrow your car if you had one?
It looks like it's going to be another nice day.
I may be able to come to Australia next October.
I've always wanted to learn how to ride a horse.
Why aren't you driving the car you always drive?
The stolen jewels must be recovered at any cost.
God gave her a beautiful face and a sweet voice.
We cannot put up with their rudeness any longer.
Tom has to tell Mary even if he doesn't want to.
I can't ride a bike because it is raining today.
Tom tried to keep his balance on the slack line.
